plot: Telethon host Joseph Lundgren, Jr., returns to the screen, gathering local celebrities, this time to raise money for a select group of children without parents. Guests include Marlon Brando...
title: The Joseph Lundgren, Jr., Telethon for Orphans of Viewers of the Towering Inferno Starring O.J. Simpson
